alert.note: Alert for Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena; Washington (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 6:02PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern St. Helena, northeastern Livingston, northern Tangipahoa and western Washington Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 602 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kentwood to near Montpelier. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Greensburg, Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Independence, Roseland, Montpelier, Mount Herman, Wilmer, Tangipahoa and Tickfaw. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 36 and 65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southeastern Louisiana.
